column1: | Variable Name | Type | Description | |---------------|------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------| | ar | int[] | An array to hold the elements that need to be sorted. | | n | int | An integer to store the size of the array (number of elements). | | sc | Scanner | An instance of the Scanner class used for input from the console. | | val | int | A temporary variable used to hold the current value being inserted in the sorted portion of the array. | | p | int | An index variable used to find the correct position to insert val in the sorted portion of the array. | | i | int | A loop counter used in the outer loop of the sorting algorithm. |
